DataElement.preferredName: OMRS Oral Cavity Change Description Score Five Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric rating of the degree to which the oral cavity and/or mucosa has changed from normal using a five point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OMRS Oral Cavity Change Description Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research tool used to assess inflammation in the mouth and classification of oral changes after bone marrow transplant and chronic graft versus host disease._The cavity lying at the upper end of the alimentary canal, bounded on the outside by the lips and inside by the oropharynx and containing in humans the tongue, gums, and teeth._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research tool used to assess inflammation in the mouth and classification of oral changes after bone marrow transplant and chronic graft versus host disease.

Concepts.definition: A research tool used to assess inflammation in the mouth and classification of oral changes after bone marrow transplant and chronic graft versus host disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: The cavity lying at the upper end of the alimentary canal, bounded on the outside by the lips and inside by the oropharynx and containing in humans the tongue, gums, and teeth.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMRS Descriptive Score Five Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A research tool used to assess inflammation in the mouth and classification of oral changes after bone marrow transplant and chronic graft versus host disease._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Intensely or extremely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality, or extent; life threatening.: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not severe or strong; far from extreme; not serious enough to endanger life.: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
